info.description: This is gopa-server. Use these APIs to manage different groups, roles of GOPA
info.title: Gopa-server Swagger Documentation

post.description: Login to obtain token, project and role
Add an application into the database
Delete this application from OPA. This method will delete ALL RELATED INFORMATION from database.

get.description: Determine if a user has permission on some resource.

post.description: Add a project/group into the database
Add a group and role to the given resource.
Delete a projectRole from a resource.

get.description: Return all groups and roles that belong to one resource.

post.description: Update the permission of a group with its related role to a resource
Add a role to the given project into the database
Delete a role from a given project

get.description: list all projects and corresponding roles of OPA

post.description: Add a new rego file by given path to the database. If the path already exists, do not insert.
Delete a rego file by given path

get.description: Return a rego file by given path currently in database. If filepath is not specified, API returns all rego files.

post.description: Update the content of a rego file by given path
Add a role into the database
Add a user into the database
Update the group or role of a given user

get.summary: HealthCheck shows `OK` as the ping-pong result.
VersionCheck show the version info as Running status
